attributes.action: Stop the building of 550 houses on Kirkleatham lane Redcar Norh Yorkshire.
attributes.additional_details:
Proposal by Homes and Community Agency. (HCA ).  
Proposed development of land West of Kikleatham lane Redcar. North Yorkshire.
attributes.background: Stop the building of 550 houses on land close to chemical works and a level 1 flood plain and animal sanctuary.

rejection.details:
This issue is the responsibility of Redcar and Cleveland Council, not of the UK Government or Parliament.

You could start a new petition with Redcar and Cleveland Council about this issue using the link below:

http://www.redcar-cleveland.gov.uk/rcbcweb.nsf/web+full+list/bc80ff6107cfa2db80256f720039b11b
